    • Constructor Detail

      • TimedLevel

        public TimedLevel(int moveCount,
                  int highScore,
                  Lokum[][] initialBoard,
                  int scoreNeeded,
                  int levelID,
                  boolean locked,
                  int specialSwapCount,
                  int timeLimit)
        Creates a TimedLevel.
        Parameters:
        moveCount - Maximum number of moves allowed to pass the level
        highScore - Highest score achieved in this level
        initialBoard - Starting board for the level
        scoreNeeded - Minimum score needed to pass the level
        levelID - ID of the level
        locked - Has the scoreNeeded been achieved
        specialSwapCount - The number of special swaps allowed in this level
        timeLimit - The maximum time allowed to finish the level
